ingredients.content: 1 tbsp fajita seasoning, homemade or packaged

preparations.content: Place simmering basket onto mixing bowl lid and weigh in rice. Remove simmering basket with rice and rinse under running water until water runs clear, then submerge in a bowl of water and let rice soak for 45 minutes.

Place onions, garlic, fajita seasoning and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>. Drain rice and transfer sautéed onions into simmering basket with reserved rice.

Place water and stock paste into mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket, add tomato paste and salt to rice, stir with spatula to combine and steam <b>25-27 min/Varoma/speed 4<b>, until rice is cooked to your liking.
Fluff rice with a fork, garnish with cilantro and serve immediately.
